title: Turkey with Preserved Lemons
ingredients: ['2 lemons, juiced', '2 skinless turkey breast fillets, cut in half', '4 chives, chopped for garnish', '1 (4cm) piece fresh root ginger, diced', '4 sprigs flat-leaf parsley, chopped', '4 preserved lemons, washed and cut into pieces', '1 knob butter', 'salt and pepper to taste']
